text: There are a number of reasons to boycott #cruise lines, like environmental violations, overwork & underpayment of crew members, over-tourism, etc. But this call for a boycott is so ridiculous that I almost feel sorry for @RoyalCaribbean / #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/UDrLlQe5jK https://t.co/o9oUjh8KCT
